Description:
It's all about the views!!
This beautifully appointed bayside residence has been custom designed to suit the panoramic surroundings that prestigious Baywater Estate has to offer. sophisticated designer living with spectacular views, superb entertaining zones and high-quality finishes throughout. Overlooking landscaped parkland offering lifestyle advantages, this outstanding home offers the ideal weekend getaway.
* Four bedrooms, two bathrooms plus downstairs powder room. The spacious main bedroom includes walk behind robe and stylish dual vanity en suite with oversized shower, bathroom with WC
* Living areas comprise formal lounge upon entry plus upstairs family room
* Spacious light-filled dining area incorporating well-equipped kitchen with ample bench space and storage options, quality 900mm stainless steel appliances with integrated rangehood, breakfast bar for all year entertaining, oversized stacking doors lead to the inbuilt Alfresco with outlook to the low maintenance rear yard
* Features include high ceilings to ground floor, ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling SS ceiling fans to all bedrooms, single car garage with external access, high quality timber laminate flooring throughout dining and entrance, quality décor and fittings, established landscaped garden surrounds
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Let The Kids Play!
The Feel:
Boasting a central position within a premium land release opposite Griggs Creek Nature Reserve, this 540sqm allotment sits just metres from Clifton Springs Primary and walking tracks to the beach.
Bring your dream home to life on one of the last remaining blocks in this popular neighbourhood, and experience the natural open space, parks and playgrounds of this master planned community!
The Facts:
-540sqm approx. north facing allotment at Bayview Estate Curlewis
-Stunning master planned community with parks and playgrounds
-One of the last remaining blocks in sold out premium release
-Walk to Nature Reserve enjoying surrounding bushland aspects
-Potential for water views from a second level (STCA)
-Safe walking track and pedestrian bridge to Clifton Springs Primary
-2min drive to Bayview Central, 5mins to Drysdale township
-15mins to Geelong CBD and Portarlington Ferry to Melbourne

Description:
Brand Spanking NEW
Super stylish & designer built by Eight Homes this 4-bedroom family friendly abode sits pretty right across the road from the park. Spacious master bedroom has open walk in robe with a modern en-suite. Down the hall is a large & light filled open plan living zone. Contemporary kitchen has smoked grey glass splash backs, stone benches, SS appliances including a 900mm electric, gas 5 burner cook top, RH, DWR with a big walk in pantry. Sliding doors from the living zone out to the undercover entertainment Merbau deck. Also, a great 2nd living/family room in the perfect privacy spot behind the kitchen. Bedrooms 2 & 3 both have BIR's. Bedroom 4 has a walk-in robe. A huge bathroom also has stone benches, luxurious deep bath & separate shower. Smart internal access via the laundry. Additional features are timber floors, 2.6 ceilings, evaporative cooling & gas ducted heating.

Description:
WELL DESIGNED, STYLISH, GREAT HOME!
A real surprise, so much has been achieved here with excellent design and style. The north facing open plan space overlooks the undercover patio and private garden, this area is used frequently to entertain easily , has kitchen, meals and living, second lounge room or theatre room. Three bedrooms master with WIR and ensuite, remaining two have BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and toilet. Features central heating, split system, pantry, quality fittings and more. Double garage with tandem allowing for direct access to rear yard. Nothing to do here but unpack and enjoy the lifestyle on the Bellarine Peninsula....fine dining, wineries and so much more. OWNERS WOULD LIKE TO RENT BACK IF ABLE.

A good starting point
Overlooking a modern parkland & designed for low maintenance living. The formal lounge at the front of the house has views of Morris Park. The master bedroom is privately located.
With artificial turf in the front & rear yard its time to retire the lawnmower.
The kitchen is central to the tiled dining alcove & carpeted family area.
An island preparation bench with dishwasher & microwave cavity. Stylish rangehood, pantry, gas hotplates.
The family area provides easy access to the backyard.
Study alcove for the home office or library.
Master bedroom with ensuite & walk in robe.
Central bathroom, low step access shower base.
Double garage with internal access.

Description:
Living Large
When size matters this 29.7 square Dennis family home on a 561m2 block is only 4 years young. Bamboo floating floor boards greet upon the spacious entry & feature throughout. All bedrooms are large & have walk in robes, bedroom 3 has access to the central two way bathroom. A powder room & separate toilet services these bedrooms & the bathroom has a deep luxurious bath perfect to bathe the kids or for you to soak, unwind & relax. Down the hall is the master bedroom which is super sized with a big en-suite featuring his & her vanities, stone bench tops, 5 cupboards for storage plus a separate shower & toilet. Stylish kitchen has stone benches, stainless steel appliances including a 900mm Bellissimo oven, 5 burner gas cook top & glass range hood. Plus there is even more an additional wall oven, dishwasher, fantastic fridge cavity, great walk in panty & filtered water. Open plan living & dining is light filled with backyard views & sliding doors out to the merbau deck. The second living is perfect for a theatre or family room with French doors to close so segregation isn't an issue if 2 televisions are on the go at the same time. Outside is plenty of yard to enjoy with retaining walls, paved path from the garage, side gates & garden shed. Additional features are a double lock up garage, gas ducted heating & solar hot water service. Just a short 600m stroll to the Curlewis shopping centre which has delicious food, supermarket, variety shops, doctors & a 24 hour chemist. Close to schools, public transport & just a 20 minute drive into Geelong's CBD. Don't forget everything the Bellarine has to offer, bay, beaches, boat ramps, wineries & ferry services you new lifestyle awaits you.
Insights: 84 Coriyule Road, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Titled land in the Bayview Estate
Fantastic opportunity to buy a titled residential block of land on the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula. The block is situated in the Bayview estate in Curlewis. It is a 468 sqm, level corner block. The Bayview estate has very few limitations in regards to designs and building timeframe. The block has fantastic views over Corio Bay as wellas over the creek and parklands with walking trails and bikepaths. This block is within walkingdistance form the local primaryschool, shoppingcenter and medical center as well as the beach and harbor of Clifton Springs. This block on 24 Mayvale Avenue, Curlewis is a true gem.

Description:
Immaculate, Stylish Family Home
Do you envy the lifestyle of those who reside on the beautiful Bellarine ? Here is an opportunity to secure this immaculately presented double story home situated only twenty minutes from Victorias largest provincial city. Ride the Peninsular Ferry to Docklands for a day out shopping or a trip to the theatre. Enjoy the close proximity to water pursuits, quality education, local shopping, cafes and restaurants too numerous to mention. Local festivals and surf beaches are all within minutes of this beautiful property. Water glimpses all around and a panoramic outlook from the beautifully appointed master suite. Everything is complete in this as new home.
Decorated in a modern coastal flavor, the home is light and bright incorporating two downstairs living areas and a kitchen perfect for the chef in the family. Stone bench tops, cupboards galore, 900mm cooker, dishwasher, feature garden window and walk-in pantry add to the quality fixtures and fittings throughout. Casual living areas flow seamlessly from indoors to outdoors with undercover entertaining and a low maintenance garden.
Upstairs includes a study nook or home office, three minor bedrooms with BIRs , family bathroom and the sprawling master bedroom and exclusive balcony.
Features of this home include evaporative cooling, gas central heating, massive 120 TV in the family room, projector, wall mounted TVs in the lounge and master bedroom, fully landscaped gardens and internal access from the garage.
Dont wait to inspect this lovely home.
Insights: 25 Love Street, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.

Description:
Extra Space Inside and Out
Fabulous feeling of space and light in this near new 3 bedroom home in the heart of Curlewis. Set on a large 576m2 block with a wide 18 metre frontage that provides rare off street yard access for a boat, caravan or trailer. Sunny main bedroom with walk-in robe, twin vanity ensuite, and roller shutters for the weekend sleep-in. Massive open plan living, and dining area with bright hi-lite windows and connecting covered outdoor decking. Central island kitchen bench with master chef style 900mm cooker, dishwasher, and walk-in pantry. Outside are low maintenance garden beds, a little grass for the kids or pets and a double garage. Walk in the sunshine to the beach, primary school and shops.

Description:
Build your Coastal Dream overlooking parklands with potential bay views
Located over the road from extensive parkland lies an opportunity to build your dream coastal property. With a large blank canvas of 626m2 (approx.) to work with there will be plenty of space for a large single level home. With a well designed 2 storey home there is potential to look to the bay and beyond.
This is a lifestyle location as you walk across the park to the walking trails connecting you to the coastline or down to the marina. Not too much further away you will find The Dell where you can swim and soon to be established, The Sunken Gallery living underwater art exhibition.
Located close to all that the Bellarine has to offer, including wineries, beaches, schools and golf courses, this property is also 10 minutes from the Portarlington- Melbourne ferry. Commuting to Melbourne CBD has never been easier. Geelong city is mere 30 mins away which offers plenty of schooling options for families seeking a seachange.
Insights: 26 Sailfish Crescent, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Stylish Family Living on 587m2.
With nothing left to do but simply move in and enjoy, why wait to build your dream family home?! Situated within the ever popular pocket of Curlewis and upon a rare large parcel of 587m2, this free flowing, practical home offers that sought after modern family living.
With the established and low maintenance front garden, this Dennis Family Home build is near new having just turned 1 year old. Oozing bespoke quality and design from the moment of entry, this immaculately presented home will impress. 4 spacious bedrooms are on offer, with the master suite sitting at the fore and equipped with a walk-in-robe and lavish ensuite with over-sized shower, double vanity and separate toilet, while the remaining 3 bedrooms all host built-in-robes. A central bathroom services the 3 remaining bedrooms and comprises shower, vanity, tiled in bath and separate toilet. Sundrenched in natural light and complete with lavish floor to ceiling sheer curtains, the feel of luxury is immediate as you flow into the open plan kitchen, living and dining. The designer kitchen is equipped with an impressive waterfall stone island bench, stainless steel 900ml gas cooking, dishwasher and walk-in-pantry all while overlooking the dining and living space. A separate lounge area with private sliding doors, a cleverly tucked away study and large laundry offering outdoor access complete this immaculately presented home.
Corner sliding doors offer that true contemporary flare and open onto an undercover outdoor area making for effortless indoor/outdoor entertaining all year round. With retained garden beds along the perimeter of the back garden, lush open lawn space and side access, the backyard is perfect for the growing family.
Other features of the home include - DLUG with internal and external access, ducted heating and cooling, stone benchtops and side access.
Located only a short 10 minute stroll to the Curlewis shopping precinct, while all local schools, public transport, the Bay, boat ramp and everything the Bellarine has to offer are merely at your fingertips. If you are seeking a quality and unique family home, without waiting to build, then this is a must see!

Description:
Exceptional Family Lifestyle
Your dream home that ticks all the boxes & you don't even have to wait to build it! You won't want to miss the opportunity to secure this superbly finished family home which sits on a large 629m2 block- a rare find in new estates. Featuring 4 bedrooms, including the spacious master complete with WIR & en-suite with double vanity plus a large shower. The remaining 3 bedrooms, all with BIRs are accompanied by a generous family bathroom including separate toilet/powder room. The large kitchen and walk in pantry is primed for entertaining with 900mm oven, thick ceasarstone waterfall bench tops with overhang for bar stools & plumbing for fridge with filtered water. The light filled open plan living area is highlighted by bifold timber doors allowing the living & dining areas to flow seamlessly onto a stunning covered alfresco area with timber deck and huge landscaped backyard. Your entertaining continues with plumbed natural gas for a BBQ and Antenna/PowerPoint to watch the footy or your favourite show, drink in hand, while the kids play. You will also find a very generous second living area that can be completely closed off to use as a home theatre or the perfect secure play space for young children. No expense has been spared with this immaculate home which includes ducted heating and evaporative cooling, high quality window furnishings, timber floors, ample storage, side access to the backyard & internal access from the double lock up garage. Just a short 600m stroll to the Curlewis shopping centre & at the doorstep of the Bellarine with the bay, beaches, wineries, schools, parks, boat ramp plus ferry service is all on offer for your new lifestyle. Don't wait, inspect your dream home today!

Description:
Practical Family Living, Convenient Locale
Just 3 years young, this custom built Vibehomes' property has all the growing family could want and need. This double story brick beauty has a free-flowing floor plan, spacious living quarters, limited neighbours and walking distance to the Curlewis shopping precinct and near to the local primary schools, public transport and the Bay.
As you enter the ground level you are greeted with floating floor boards and a wide entry. The fore of the home has a study, powder room, laundry with garden access, garage access and plenty of storage before flowing into the hub of the home. The custom galley style kitchen includes waterfall stone benchtops, stainless steel dishwasher, Domain gas 900mm freestanding oven, microwave cavity and plenty of pantry and cupboard space, overlooking the first living area, separate dining area and rumpus room with access onto to the alfresco.
The first level is home to a second living area with balcony access, lavish master suite with walk-in robe, ensuite including double stone vanity, separate toilet and large shower. Bedrooms 2,3 and 4 are all sizeable rooms including built-in-robes. The main bathroom with tiled in bath, shower and stone vanity, separate toilet and linin press complete the upstairs level.
The façade of the home coupled with the low maintenance garden offers fantastic street appeal. The alfresco equipped with ceiling fan and LED lights makes entertaining easy with room for the kids and pets to run around; the side of the home offers fantastic through access via double gates and more room for planter boxes, sandpits etc.
Features of this home include ducted heating through both levels, split system cooling/ heating x 3, alarm system, security doors, custom light fittings, stone benchtops throughout, custom kitchen window, double lock up garage with remote access and internal/external access, balcony and wide side access to the yard via double gates.
This stunning family homes offers practical family living in an up and coming area at such an affordable price.

Description:
Excellence!
A truly limited opportunity to secure an executive residence within a boutique waterfront development! Glorious bay views and the tranquil wide open spaces of neighbouring wetlands are sure to delight a prospective purchaser with the highest of expectations.
• A stunning streetscape will create an anticipation for a wonderful inspection; upon entry you will be instantly impressed by striking modern finishes, an exaggerated ceiling height and a bespoke staircase.
• A stunning example of a contemporary open-plan design delivers a light and bright experience which is further enhanced by a north-easterly orientation.
• The upper level of this home is dedicated to embracing the panoramic 'vistas' – clever use of feature windows create a seamless inside/outside connection with the tranquil surrounds. An abundance of birdlife & the distinct sounds of the 'Growling Grass Frog' ensure that all your senses will be delighted.
• The kitchen is a sleek design and serves up: dual Caesar stone bench-tops; quality stainless-steel appliances (including a 900mm dual-fuel upright cooker); custom cabinetry; pendant lighting; expansive walk-in-pantry; and a full span window feature to provide that wow factor.
• The main living area is bathed in natural light; crisp white finishes complement the warmth and charm of a gas log fire. Dual glass doors flow out onto a tiled alfresco zone; a lovely place to take in a classic Bellarine Peninsula sunset while you enjoy a glass of one of the award winning local wines. A toilet and powder room provide further convenience while you entertain guests.
•3 beautifully appointed bedrooms with an additional study; the master suite is luxurious with an oversized walk-in-robe and 'dressing room' as well as ensuite with a stone bench-top and custom cabinetry.
• A second living area downstairs creates further flexibility to what is already a very user friendly floor plan; dual glass doors step out onto a decked entertaining zone. Full landscaped gardens further endorse this property as a genuine 'turn the key and start enjoying' prospect.
• The main bathroom boasts floor to ceiling tiles, plantation shutters and a luxurious free-standing bath.
• An inclusion list simply too long to include but to name a few; double glazed windows, Nobo heating, multiple split systems, plantation shutters, custom window furnishings and quality fittings.

Description:
As-new designer home features premium inclusions throughout
AVAILABLE TO INSPECT FROM 14TH MARCH ONWARD
No expense has been spared on this former display home that has never been lived in and is presented in immaculate as-new condition. It features on-trend designer interiors and premium inclusions throughout and offers stylish low-maintenance living with plenty of space for your growing family. You'll also love this peaceful holiday location that's close to schools and shops, three minutes to Clifton Springs boat ramp for easy access to Port Phillip Bay, and just 20 minutes to all major amenities in Geelong CBD.
-- Tiled open-plan family/meals area, plus separate carpeted living area plus study
-- High-end gas kitchen with waterfall-edge stone bench tops and a walk-in pantry
-- Stunning master bedroom with walk-in robe and ensuite opening to a private courtyard
-- Built-in robes to three generous extra bedrooms; designer family-sized main bathroom
-- Elegant alfresco entertaining with fireplace, built-in barbeque and gravel fire pit
-- Lush easy-care gardens create plenty of privacy without the maintenance hassles
-- Internal laundry with outdoor access; double garage/workshop with third toilet/wet room
The fenced front yard with an ultra-modern covered porch creates an impressive entry into this five-star designer home.
The stylish master bedroom is located off the entry hall at front and features a bright outlook through a stunning frameless corner window plus elegant wall paneling and a luxurious ensuite with twin vanity.
Continue into the carpeted living room with striking ceiling recess and adjoining study space, and through to the open-plan family/meals area with premium chef's kitchen.
The family/meals area flows onto two separate patios connected by a gravel fire pit with built-in timber bench seating for seamless alfresco entertaining, and the three good-sized bedrooms join the main bathroom and internal laundry in a separate wing of the home at rear.
Insights: 7 Centennial Boulevard, Curlewis VIC 3222 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 4 bedroom house in Curlewis have recently been sold.
